field.name: wControlCycle
field.description: Sets the value for the periodic regulation. Time base is 1/20Mhz. (Example: Value of 20000 is equal to 1ms)

field.name: wAgcFastModeConfig
field.description: Controls AGC FastMode (StepSizeEnabled: 13 + StepSize: 12..11 + DurationEnabled: 10 + Duration: 9..0 )

field.name: wGuardTimeFastMode
field.description: Guard time after AGC fast mode has been triggered. This happens in the following scenarios: - End of Receive - End of Transmit - After a gear switch Time base is 1/20MHz (Example: Value of 2000 is equal to 100us)

field.name: wGuardTimeSofDetected
field.description: Guard time after SoF or SC detection. This is to avoid any DPC regulation between SoF/SC and actual begin of reception. Time base is 1/20MHz (Example: Value of 2000 is equal to 100us)

field.name: wGuardTimeFieldOn
field.description: Guard time after Gear Switch during FieldOn instruction. Time base is 1/20MHz (Example: Value of 2000 is equal to 100us)

field.name: bOcProtControl
field.description: Control byte (StartGear: 7..4 bits + GearStep: 3..1 bits + OcProtLoopEnabled: 0 bit )

field.name: bAgcShiftValue
field.description: Shift value for AGC dynamic low threshold adjustment

field.name: bSizeOfLUT
field.description: Number of fields in the following configuration look up table

array.name: bConfigLUT
array.description: Look up table for configuration values
